00002 #define GainConstants_h 1

00004 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00005 #include <config.h>

00007 
00008 #include <cmath>
00009 #include "lcio.h"
00010 #include <LCHcalCalibrationObject.hh>
00011 
00012 using namespace lcio;
00013 
00014 namespace CALICE {
00015 
00016 class GainConstants;
00017 
00025 class GainConstants: public LCHcalCalibrationObject{
00026 
00027 public:
00028   
00031   GainConstants() {};
00032   
00039   GainConstants(unsigned chip, unsigned channel, float value, float error) {
00040     unsigned _cellId = (chip << 8) + channel;
00041     setCellKey(_cellId);
00042     obj()->setFloatVal(0, value);
00043     obj()->setFloatVal(1, error);
00044   };
00045   
00046   GainConstants(LCObject* obj): LCHcalCalibrationObject(obj) {};
00047   
00048   virtual ~GainConstants() {};
00049 
00052   float getGainValue() const {
00053     return getFloatVal(0);
00054   };  
00055 
00058   float getGainError() const {  
00059     return getFloatVal(1);
00060   };
00061   
00066   float applyCalibration(float inputValue) const {
00067     return (float) (inputValue / getGainValue());
00068   };
00069   
00072   float cancelCalibration(float outputValue) const {
00073     return (float) (outputValue * getGainValue());
00074   };  
00075   
00082   float applyCalibrationError(float inputValue, float inputError) const {
00083     return (float) (sqrt(pow(inputError/inputValue,2)+pow(getGainError()/getGainValue(),2))*(inputValue/getGainValue()));
00084   };      
00085 
00088   float cancelCalibrationError(float outputValue, float outputError) const {
00089     return (float) (outputValue * getGainError() + getGainValue() * outputError);
00090   };      
00091 
00095   bool calibrationValid() const {
00096     return (!std::isnan(getGainValue()) && (getGainValue()>0));
00097   };
00098 
00102   bool keepEvent(float resultValue, float resultError) const {
00103     return true;
00104   };    
00105 
00108   void print (std::ostream& os);
00109   
00112   const std::string getTypeName() const {
00113     return "GainConstants";
00114   };   
00115 
00118   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00119     return "i:CellKey,f:GainValue,f:GainError";
00120   };  
00121     
00122 };
00123 
00124 }
00125 
00126 #endif
